entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain or light wet snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 16 April 2023
